Interface UserRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<User,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<User,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<User,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<User,java.lang.Long>

    @Repository
public interface UserRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<User,java.lang.Long>
    Contains Users Query for Storage.
